actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to permit family planning projects to offer adoption services.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Federal Adoption Services Act of 1997 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to permit family planning projects to offer adoption services. Requires such services to be nondiscriminatory as to race, color, religion, or national origin.

titles.title: A bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to permit family planning projects to offer adoption services.
